description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bring your very own Avatar into a holiday winter wonderland. Compete online with up to 16 other players in a full-on snowball battle!! Unlock cool new abilities and use them to secure your place on the global high score list. In full HD 1080P!
